general.credits_html:
WARNING! Electronic Nicotine Delivery System (ENDS) products sold on this website can expose you to chemicals including formaldehyde, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer, and nicotine, which is known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information, go to www.p65warnings.ca.gov.

YOU MUST MEET THE MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENT OF YOUR STATE TO PURCHASE PRODUCTS FROM OUR STORE. FALSIFYING YOUR AGE FOR THE PURPOSE OF PURCHASING PRODUCTS ONLINE IS STRICTLY ILLEGAL AND PUNISHABLE BY LAW.

checkout.age_verification_html:
VapeJuiceDepot uses AgeChecker Age Verification. This is done to meet FDA and State requirements regarding tobacco and vapor product sales. AgeChecker is an industry leader in age verification, and uses multiple trusted and secure data sources to verify the information provided with each order. This process has been developed with privacy and security in mind. Sensitive information is neither shared nor accessible. It is our commitment to ensure timely and expedient service, and refusal to utilize these services will result in cancellation of your order.

Note: If your transaction has been declined, please contact our Customer Service team at support@vapejuicedepot.com before attempting further transactions as holds may occur on your account.
checkout.required_checkbox_1_label_html: I read and agree to the terms and conditions.
checkout.required_checkbox_2_label_html: I am of legal smoking age for the state in which I reside.
checkout.required_checkbox_3_label_html: I understand my order for flavored e-liquid will be canceled if shipping is destined to Rhode Island,  or San Francisco due to compliance with local ordinance and regulation.
checkout.required_checkbox_error: Please agree to the age verification
